mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAR_INFO (CAR_ID, ORIGIN, MANUFACTURER, MODEL, DETAILED_MODEL, VEH_NUM, PRICE, MODEL_YEAR, FUEL, TRANSMISSION, CARGRADE, DETAILED_CARGRADE, DRIVEN_DIST, ACCIDENT_INFO, OPTIONS, COLOR, DTL_IMG_CAR, SALE_STATUS, PANER_ID, SKELETON_ID) VALUE (#{CAR_ID}, #{ORIGIN}, #{MANUFACTURER}, #{MODEL}, #{DETAILED_MODEL}, #{VEH_NUM}, #{PRICE}, #{MODEL_YEAR}, #{FUEL}, #{TRANSMISSION}, #{CARGRADE}, #{DETAILED_CARGRADE}, #{DRIVEN_DIST}, #{ACCIDENT_INFO}, #{OPTIONS}, #{COLOR}, #{DTL_IMG_CAR}, #{SALE_STATUS}, #{PANER_ID}, #{SKELETON_ID}})
